Title: The Batman
Descriptions: When the Riddler, a sadistic serial killer, begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.
Stars: Robert Pattinson, Zoë Kravitz, Jeffrey Wright, Colin Farrell

Title: West Side Story
Descriptions: An adaptation of the 1957 musical, West Side Story explores forbidden love and the rivalry between the Jets and the Sharks, two teenage street gangs of different ethnic backgrounds.
Stars: Ansel Elgort, Rachel Zegler, Ariana DeBose, David Alvarez

Title: The Weekend Away
Descriptions: A weekend getaway to Croatia that goes awry when a woman is accused of killing her best friend. As she attempts to clear her name and uncover the truth, her efforts unearth a painful secret.
Stars: Leighton Meester, Christina Wolfe, Ziad Bakri, Luke Norris

Title: Yön ritari
Descriptions: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
Stars: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine

Title: Nightmare Alley
Descriptions: An ambitious carny with a talent for manipulating people with a few well-chosen words hooks up with a female psychologist who is even more dangerous than he is.
Stars: Bradley Cooper, Cate Blanchett, Toni Collette, Willem Dafoe

Title: Kuolema Niilillä
Descriptions: While on vacation on the Nile, Hercule Poirot must investigate the murder of a young heiress.
Stars: Tom Bateman, Annette Bening, Kenneth Branagh, Russell Brand

Title: Batman Begins
Descriptions: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.
Stars: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Ken Watanabe, Liam Neeson

Title: House of Gucci
Descriptions: When Patrizia Reggiani, an outsider from humble beginnings, marries into the Gucci family, her unbridled ambition begins to unravel their legacy and triggers a reckless spiral of betrayal, decadence, revenge, and ultimately...murder.
Stars: Lady Gaga, Adam Driver, Al Pacino, Jeremy Irons

Title: Yön ritarin paluu
Descriptions: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.
Stars: Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway, Gary Oldman

Title: West Side Story
Descriptions: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.
Stars: Natalie Wood, George Chakiris, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn

Title: Fast & Furious 9
Descriptions: Dom and the crew must take on an international terrorist who turns out to be Dom and Mia's estranged brother.
Stars: Vin Diesel, Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster, Tyrese Gibson

Title: Texas Chainsaw Massacre
Descriptions: After nearly 50 years of hiding, Leatherface returns to terrorize a group of idealistic young friends who accidentally disrupt his carefully shielded world in a remote Texas town.
Stars: Sarah Yarkin, Elsie Fisher, Mark Burnham, Jacob Latimore

Title: Joker
Descriptions: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.
Stars: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy

Title: DC Superlemmikkien liiga
Descriptions: Krypto the Super-Dog and Superman are inseparable best friends, sharing the same superpowers and fighting crime side by side in Metropolis. However, Krypto must master his own powers for a rescue mission when Superman is kidnapped.
Stars: Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart, Vanessa Bayer, Natasha Lyonne

Title: Kummisetä
Descriptions: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.
Stars: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Diane Keaton

Title: Batman - paluu
Descriptions: While Batman deals with a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaking havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman, a female employee of the latter becomes the Catwoman with her own vendetta.
Stars: Michael Keaton, Danny DeVito, Michelle Pfeiffer, Christopher Walken

Title: Kimi
Descriptions: An agoraphobic Seattle tech worker uncovers evidence of a crime.
Stars: Zoë Kravitz, Byron Bowers, Rita Wilson, Erika Christensen

Title: Gangubai Kathiawadi
Descriptions: A woman becomes a powerful underworld figure.
Stars: Alia Bhatt, Shantanu Maheshwari, Vijay Raaz, Indira Tiwari

Title: Veitset esiin - kaikki ovat epäiltyjä
Descriptions: A detective investigates the death of the patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.
Stars: Daniel Craig, Chris Evans, Ana de Armas, Jamie Lee Curtis

Title: Nobody
Descriptions: A docile family man slowly reveals his true character after his house gets burgled by two petty thieves, which, coincidentally, leads him into a bloody war with a Russian crime boss.
Stars: Bob Odenkirk, Aleksey Serebryakov, Connie Nielsen, Christopher Lloyd

Title: Vihreä maili
Descriptions: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
Stars: Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse, Bonnie Hunt

Title: Vangitut
Descriptions: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.
Stars: Hugh Jackman, Jake Gyllenhaal, Viola Davis, Melissa Leo

Title: Pulp Fiction: Tarinoita väkivallasta
Descriptions: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
Stars: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson, Bruce Willis

Title: The Wolf of Wall Street
Descriptions: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.
Stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie, Matthew McConaughey

Title: Killers of the Flower Moon
Descriptions: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.
Stars: Jesse Plemons, Leonardo DiCaprio, Brendan Fraser, Robert De Niro

Title: Amerikan psyko
Descriptions: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.
Stars: Christian Bale, Justin Theroux, Josh Lucas, Bill Sage

Title: Suurenmoisen lahjakkuuden sietämätön taakaa
Descriptions: A cash-strapped Nicolas Cage agrees to make a paid appearance at a billionaire super fan's birthday party, but is really an informant for the CIA since the billionaire fan is a drug kingpin and gets cast in a Tarantino movie.
Stars: Nicolas Cage, Jacob Scipio, Pedro Pascal, Demi Moore

Title: Seitsemän
Descriptions: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.
Stars: Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt, Kevin Spacey, Andrew Kevin Walker

Title: The Devil All the Time
Descriptions: Sinister characters converge around a young man devoted to protecting those he loves in a postwar backwoods town teeming with corruption and brutality.
Stars: Bill Skarsgård, Tom Holland, Michael Banks Repeta, Emilio Subercaseaux Campos

Title: Good Time
Descriptions: After a botched bank robbery lands his younger brother in prison, Connie Nikas embarks on a twisted odyssey through New York City's underworld to get his brother Nick out of jail.
Stars: Robert Pattinson, Benny Safdie, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Buddy Duress

Title: The Outfit
Descriptions: An expert tailor must outwit a dangerous group of mobsters in order to survive a fateful night.
Stars: Mark Rylance, Zoey Deutch, Dylan O'Brien, Johnny Flynn

Title: Idän pikajunan arvoitus
Descriptions: When a murder occurs on the train on which he's travelling, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case.
Stars: Kenneth Branagh, Penélope Cruz, Willem Dafoe, Judi Dench

Title: Kingsman: Kultainen kehä
Descriptions: After the Kingsman's headquarters are destroyed and the world is held hostage, an allied spy organisation in the United States is discovered. These two elite secret organisations must band together to defeat a common enemy.
Stars: Taron Egerton, Colin Firth, Mark Strong, Channing Tatum

Title: Ambulance
Descriptions: Two robbers steal an ambulance after their heist goes awry.
Stars: Jake Gyllenhaal, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Eiza González, Garret Dillahunt

Title: The Gentlemen
Descriptions: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.
Stars: Matthew McConaughey, Charlie Hunnam, Michelle Dockery, Jeremy Strong

Title: Miss Willoughby and the Haunted Bookshop
Descriptions: A University professor with an insatiable appetite for investigation is asked by some old family friends to investigate a series of hauntings at their antique bookstore.
Stars: Nathalie Cox, Kelsey Grammer, Louise Bangay, Tara Fitzgerald

Title: Zodiac
Descriptions: Between 1968 and 1983, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.
Stars: Jake Gyllenhaal, Robert Downey Jr., Mark Ruffalo, Anthony Edwards

Title: Nightride
Descriptions: Nightride is a real time, one shot thriller about a dealer trying to pull off one last job in order to go straight.
Stars: Moe Dunford, Joana Ribeiro, Gerard Jordan, Ciaran Flynn

Title: Sans répit
Descriptions: After going to extremes to cover up an accident, a corrupt cop's life spirals out of control when he starts receiving threats from a mysterious witness.
Stars: Franck Gastambide, Simon Abkarian, Michaël Abiteboul, Tracy Gotoas

Title: Hurja jengi
Descriptions: Several reformed yet misunderstood criminal animals attempt to become good, with some disastrous results along the way.
Stars: Sam Rockwell, Marc Maron, Awkwafina, Craig Robinson

Title: Baby Driver
Descriptions: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.
Stars: Ansel Elgort, Jon Bernthal, Jon Hamm, Eiza González

Title: Wrath of Man
Descriptions: The plot follows H, a cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving hundreds of millions of dollars around Los Angeles each week.
Stars: Jason Statham, Holt McCallany, Josh Hartnett, Rocci Williams

Title: Batgirl
Descriptions: Based upon the popular DC character, Barbara Gordon dons the guise of Batgirl to fight crime.
Stars: Leslie Grace, J.K. Simmons, Michael Keaton, Brendan Fraser

Title: The Many Saints of Newark
Descriptions: Witness the making of Tony Soprano. The story that reveals the humanity behind Tony's struggles and the influence his family - especially his uncle, Dickie Moltisanti - had over him becoming the most iconic mob boss of all time.
Stars: Alessandro Nivola, Leslie Odom Jr., Jon Bernthal, Vera Farmiga

Title: Menetetty maa
Descriptions: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.
Stars: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Woody Harrelson

Title: Cruella
Descriptions: A live-action prequel feature film following a young Cruella de Vil.
Stars: Emma Stone, Emma Thompson, Joel Fry, Paul Walter Hauser

Title: Hiomattomat timantit
Descriptions: With his debts mounting and angry collectors closing in, a fast-talking New York City jeweler risks everything in hope of staying afloat and alive.
Stars: Adam Sandler, Julia Fox, Idina Menzel, Mesfin Lamengo

Title: Uhrilampaat
Descriptions: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
Stars: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Lawrence A. Bonney, Kasi Lemmons

Title: Leon
Descriptions: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.
Stars: Jean Reno, Gary Oldman, Natalie Portman, Danny Aiello

Title: Kummisetä osa II
Descriptions: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.
Stars: Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton
